DataElement.preferredName: University of Washington Quality of Life Questionnaire Past 7 Days Quality of Life Rating 6 Point Scale
DataElement.preferredDefinition: A person's stated perception of their health-related quality of life in the past seven days, using a 6 point Likert scale.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: University of Washington Quality of Life Questionnaire Past 7 Days Quality of Life Rating
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A questionnaire designed to assess health-related quality of life in head and neck cancer patients._The most recent week including today._The subjective measurement of an individual's sense of well-being and ability to enjoy life. The concept holds varying meanings for different people and may evolve over time. For some individuals it implies autonomy, empowerment, capability, and choice; for others, security, social integration, or freedom from stress or illness._The act of ascertaining or fixing the value or worth of something.

ObjectClass.preferredName: University of Washington Quality of Life Scale, Version 4
ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A questionnaire designed to assess health-related quality of life in head and neck cancer patients.

Concepts.longName: University of Washington Quality of Life Scale, Version 4
Concepts.definition: A questionnaire designed to assess health-related quality of life in head and neck cancer patients.

Property.preferredName: Past Week Quality of Life Rating
Property.preferredDefinition: The most recent week, including today.:The subjective measurement of an individual's sense of well-being and ability to enjoy life. The concept holds varying meanings for different people and may evolve over time. For some individuals it implies autonomy, empowerment, capability, and choice; for others, security, social integration, or freedom from stress or illness.:The act of ascertaining or fixing the value or worth of something.

Concepts.definition: The most recent week. May include the present day.

The subjective measurement of an individual's sense of well-being and ability to enjoy life. The concept holds varying meanings for different people and may evolve over time. For some individuals it implies autonomy, empowerment, capability, and choice; for others, security, social integration, or freedom from stress or illness.
The act of ascertaining or fixing the value or worth of something.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Process and results associated with self-reported measures and instruments, surveys, other tools

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: An ordered reference standard of six responses from outstanding to very poor.
